name: Revenge (asadigitaltz)
description:
You play as an alien ship looking for revenge on humans who had captured your leader.  Be ware humans wont go down without a fight.

The controls are :

W and S for pitch 

A and D for roll

Space to shoot.

HOW TO PLAY

To turn roll first to a certain angle then pitch up. 

You can only shoot the gun for a limited amount of time before it needs to cool down.

Try to dodge the missiles.

Flight controls are subject to change in the future when I become comfortable with scripting in C#.

Please leave your comments and feel free to criticize. I will try to fix it and make it more enjoyable. 

It is my first project as I am learning how to use Unity, so take it easy :)
